{{warning}}This guide is a stub{{/warning}}
PhenoTips is built on top of [[XWiki>>http://xwiki.org]], a professional java-based with enterprise features such as strong rights management, LDAP authentication, PDF export, full skinning, advanced Form and scripting engine. For information about XWiki development, please consult the [[XWiki Developer Documentation>>http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/WebHome]].
